column4: I've been unsuccessfully trying to uninstall linux for the last week or so now.. i've tried fedora, ubuntu, and vidalinux and cannot get xserver configured on any of them.. Is there a distro that is likely to work, or something i can do to fix my ubuntu install that is currenly on my slave hd?
does the livecd work for you?
i'll start the live cd torrent now
that should work.  Also, I've forgotten the details, but you can reset the xorg MD5sum for dpkg-reconfigure somehow.  My apologies I have not been able to find it.
